traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The baboon has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Agile
traits.description: The deer doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 feet. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The beetle sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Fire damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The hyena has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d6) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The piranha can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The snake doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the centipede's next turn.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The wasp doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

name: Giant Eagle
languages: Celestial; understands Common and Primordial (Auran) but can't speak them

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The eagle makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Rampage (1/Day)
bonusActions.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that was already Bloodied, the hyena can move up to half its Speed, and it makes one Bite attack.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The toad can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The toad's Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12).

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: The toad swallows a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. While swallowed, the target isn't Grappled but has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad. In addition, the target takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the end of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time, and it can't use Bite while it has a swallowed target. If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the Prone condition.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Gouge
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny piranha. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bites
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the allosaurus moved 30+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition, and the allosaurus can make one Bite attack against it.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bear makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature and the rhinoceros moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ankylosaurus makes two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The archelon can breathe the air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archelon makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hippopotamus makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The shark can breathe the only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shark makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach 5 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The squid can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The squid makes one Bite attack and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 16) from one of two tentacles, and the squid can pull the target up to 10 feet straight toward itself.

reactions.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
reactions.description: Trigger: The squid takes damage while underwater. Response: The squid releases ink that fills a 15-foot Cube centered on itself, and the squid moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mammoth makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the mammoth moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

bonusActions.name: Trample
bonusActions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 29 (4d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The tyrannosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition and can't be targeted by the tyrannosaurus's Tail.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 15 ft. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
